job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-30T05:16:36.000Z", "description": "Full-Stack Software Engineer

Dedham MA - Hybrid

Full-time

Senior Full Stack Software Engineer will contribute to the design and build of software architecture and product suite and must have an understanding of large-scale, real-time integrations with external systems and user facing applications. Please send an update resume to Chris McMillan at cmcmillan@alexandertg.com

The Role
  • A hands-on contributor for the development of full application stack and bring best practices to coding, performance, release, testing and automation.
  • Utilize cloud-native architectures to deliver resilient, high-availability services
  • Work on definition and execution of security standards and compliance
Requirements
  • 5+ year of full-stack scale web application development
  • 2+ of architecture exp.
  • AWS experience
  • Must have React.js experience
  • Experience with Python, JavaScript, Node.js
  • Built scalable RESTful APIs with a framework i.e. Django, Falcon, Flask, Spring Boot
  • Experience with SQL and relational databases (Aurura DB/MySQL)
Please send an updated resume to Chris McMillan at cmcmillan@alexandertg.com

*MONATG*

ATG456
